name: Pasture
description:
The game is about taking care of cows during the night on pasture. Don't let wolfs kill your cows, by lighting them up with a flashlight or fireplace.

My very first game I made, completed it a year ago and I think it's not too bad. There are some bugs but not any game breaking that I know of. I'll leave all the bugs in, so I'll have something to laugh at in a couple of years.
